name: SmartDev
description:
SmartDev is a Swiss Agile offshore software development company founded in Danang, Vietnam.
Our core area of business is Web-based Applications, Mobile Applications on iOS & Android, Graphic Design & Branding, Mobile Wallet & E-Commerce Systems. We can also offer a fully outsourced development centre (ODC) in Vietnam managed by your own staff.
We have some of the ‘best value’ software developers in Asia ready to take your business to the next level. With prices starting at $95 USD per day for junior developers and Senior Developers at $182 USD we offer the best value in Asia. We also have European Innovation Consultants and Project Managers available at competitive rates.
